text: (upbeat contemporary music)

- [Announcer] Does your
team need an app designed
specifically for its business needs?

How about one that your
team can use to manage work
and stay in sync on the go?

Amazon Honeycode's new
experience will put your team
in the driver's seat

to build internal
productivity apps in minutes.

With Honeycode's pre-built
ready-to-use templates,

you don't need to wait
on IT to spin up an app.

Honeycode's templates
come packed with features
to jumpstart your team's productivity.
You can easily make customizations

without ever writing
a single line of code.
For instance, you can set up actions

so Honeycode can put your team's
manual tasks on autopilot.

From making updates to
sending notifications,

Honeycode will automate
processes giving time back
for meaningful value add work.

Ready to give Amazon
Honeycode's new experience a go?
Try it for free today.
